General.Name: Jiangsu Yuxing Film Tech
General.Description: Jiangsu Yuxing Film Technology Co., Ltd engages in research, development, production, and sale of functional polyester films in the People's Republic of China. The company's product portfolio includes film for solar cell back sheet, electrical insulation, electronic, heald, heddle, and printing; and optical film and pet film for new energy lithium battery. It also engages in the sale of mechanical parts; and testing of polymer materials. The company was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Changzhou, the People's Republic of China.
General.Address: No.8-8, Tongzihe West Road, Changzhou, China, 213023
